document_data.name: Company of the Yellow Banner
document_data.mainbody: The '''Company of the Yellow Banner''' were an [[:Category:Adventuring companies|adventuring party]] operating in the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Little was known of the Company or its achievements before they landed in [[Chult]] except that they had found a ''[[ghost lantern]]'' containing the spirit of an [[moon elf]] [[warlock]] named [[The Starfallen]], whom they quested to raise from the dead. They were killed to a man in the [[Tomb of the Nine Gods]]<ref>{{cite book/Tomb of Annihilation|103}} while looking for the ''[[Eye of Zaltec]]'', which they hoped would resurrect The Starfallen.

Members.Allies:
* An [[awaken]]ed lizard that the group hoped could help them defeat the traps that they would find in Omu.<ref>
* [[Biff Longsteel]], a [[doppelganger]] named [[Pox (doppelganger)|Pox]], in the form of a [[human]] adventurer. 'Biff' got trapped in a ''[[mirror of life trapping]]''.<ref>
